text: I am *very* much enjoying @holly_cummins talk about cloud native and the things you have to do so you can *actually* move faster - features a lot of stories about space probes and things that went wrong - plus many lessons learned that ring true to me #oreillysacon

author.name: Sarah Wells
author.description: Tech consultant/author. Microservices, board games, cheese, music, swimming, walking. @sarahjwells@mastodon.social
